name: HolyAngemon
description: MagnaAngemon wears a Holy Ring on its right wrist and bears the Crest of Hope on its forehead. The DigiCode on its Heaven's Gate reads ヘブンズゲート ( ヘブンズゲート , Hebunzu Gēto ? , lit. "Heaven's Gate")  and the DigiCode on its Excalibur and ribbons reads デジタルモンスター ( デジタルモンスター , Dejitaru Monsutā ? , lit. "Digital Monster") .
